sen.j: 町資将（まち？（まち の？）すけまさ、永正15年3月9日 (旧暦)（1518年4月18日） - 弘治 (日本)元年10月24日 (旧暦)（1555年12月8日））は戦国時代 (日本)中期の公卿。
sen.e: Sukemasa MACHI (MACHI no Sukemasa?, (April 28, 1518 - November 18, 1555) was a Kugyo (the top court officials) in the middle period of the Sengoku Period (Period of Warring States).
sen.cmt: 暦変換ツールでは訳文のようになりました
sen.e: Sukemasa MACHI (MACHI no Sukemasa? - April 28, 1518 - November 18, 1555) was a Kugyo (top court official) during the middle period of the Sengoku Period (Period of Warring States).
Sukemasa MACHI (MACHI no Sukemasa) (April 28, 1518 - November 18, 1555) was a Kugyo (top court official) during the mid Sengoku period (period of warring states) (Japan).
sen.cmt: period 小文字にしました。

sen.j: 藤原北家日野流柳原家の流れを汲む町家当主。
sen.e: He was the head of the Machi family, which was under the line of the Yanagiwara family of the Hino line of the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan
He was the head of the Machi family, under the Yanagiwara family of the Hino line of the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan
He was the head of the Machi family, under the Yanagiwara family of the Hino line of the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan
His court rank was Shosanmi (Senior Third Rank) Gon Chunagon (a provisional vice-councilor of state).
His court rank was Shosanmi (Senior Third Rank) Gon Chunagon (a provisional vice-councilor of state).
His court rank was Shosanmi (Senior Third Rank) Gon Chunagon (a provisional vice-councilor of state).

sen.j: 出家して法名を宗寂と号す。
sen.e: He bacame as a priest and called his homyo (a name given to a person who enters the Buddhist priesthood) Shujaku (宗寂).
He bacame as a priest and called his homyo (a name given to a person who enters the Buddhist priesthood) Shujaku (宗寂).
He became a priest and called his homyo (a name given to a person who enters the Buddhist priesthood) Shujaku (宗寂).
sen.cmt: became a priest としました。

sen.j: 高辻家より養子に入るも子の柳原淳光（町将光）が柳原家を継いだため断絶し、家制度家の設立、消滅となる。
sen.e: Even though he got adopted from the Takatsuji family, since his child Atsumitsu YANAGIWARA (Masamitsu MACHI) inherited the Yanagiwara family, the family line ended, 家制度家の設立, and became extinct.
Even though he was adopted from the Takatsuji family, since his child Atsumitsu YANAGIWARA (Masamitsu MACHI) inherited the Yanagiwara family, the family line ended, 家制度家の設立, and became extinct.
Even though he was adopted from the Takatsuji family, since his child Atsumitsu YANAGIWARA (Masamitsu MACHI) inherited the Yanagiwara family, the family line ended, and became extinct.
sen.cmt: 家制度家の設立 はリンク先の表示のようですので、削除しました。

sen.j: 父高辻章長と母町広光女の次男。
sen.e: He was the second son of his father, Akinaga TAKATSUJI, and his mother, a daughter of Hiromitsu MACHI.
He was the second son of his father, Akinaga TAKATSUJI, and his mother, the daughter of Hiromitsu MACHI.
He was the second son of his father, Akinaga TAKATSUJI, and his mother, the daughter of Hiromitsu MACHI.

sen.j: すでに亡くなっていた町広光の嗣となる。
sen.e: He became as the heir of Hiromitsu MACHI, who had already died.
He became the heir of Hiromitsu MACHI, who had already died.
He became the heir of Hiromitsu MACHI, who had already died.

tit.e: Record of offices and ranks held
tit.cmt: 他記事と統一しました。
コロンを追加しました。

sen.e: He was born.
He was born.
He was born.

tit.cmt: コロンを追加しました。

sen.e: He was appointed as Sangi (councillor).
He was appointed Sangi (councillor).
He was appointed Sangi (councilor).
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

tit.cmt: コロンを追加しました。

sen.e: He died.
He died.
He died.
